resources.string:
News:

 1.0.28
 + new about activity with history versions;
 + vibration settings.

 1.0.27
 + export to CSV format;
 + share diagram image.

 1.0.26
 + period diagram, summary and arithmetic mean values;
 + backup to Google Drive;
 + testing export to Google calendar one record;
 + PRO-version.

 1.0.25
 + new legend for diagrams;
 + icons on tab;
 * fix somebugs.

 1.0.24.3
 * fix some bugs.

 1.0.24.2
 * fix some bugs.

 1.0.24
 + counter sort enable;
 + filters;
 + grey color enable.

 1.0.23
 + add autostart alarm when device reboot;
 * fix design on small screens;
 * fix some bugs.

 1.0.22
 + add diary.

 1.0.21
 + add start time (today, week, month, year, all time);
 * fix some bugs.
 1.0.11
 + add alarm.

 1.0.10
 + add union records.

 1.0.9
 + add split records.

 1.0.8
 + add color choose.

 1.0.7
 + add delete counters and reset.

 1.0.6
 + add diagram.

 1.0.5
 + add records.

 alpha3
 + add counters.
